data.name: Crush that Interview: Socks from a drawer
data.description:
You sent in your resume and you got that call for an interview. The role requires some Statistics so you brush up on Fundamentals. 

At the start of the interview, the interviewer greets you and explains:

"_So you can ease in, I will start with a warm-up question:_

_You have a sock drawer with 3 pairs of socks of the following colors: Red, Green and Blue, so in total there are 18 socks in that drawer._ 

_Write a program to determine the probability of holding a pair of socks in your hand after you draw 3 socks randomly and without putting any of them back._"

Please round your answer to 4 decimal places.
